constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 215 (Tuesday, December 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MACE:
H.R. 6275.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8, Clauses 1 and 18
[Page H7824]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to administer a COVID-19 vaccine to officers and employees of the U.S. Border Patrol, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, or certain Department of the Interior officers and employees or require that such officers and employees receive such a vaccine as a condition of employment.
